General.Name: Guangdong Taienkang Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Taienkang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. markets pharmaceutical products in China. The company operates as an agent for pharmaceutical products, such as stomach relief pills, female contraception pills, and iodine tablets; and skincare oil, as well as equipment, including endoscopic surgery staplers and blood glucose test strips. It is also involved in the research and development, production, and sale of Chinese patent medicines, external medicines, medical devices, and other health materials. The company was formerly known as Shantou Taikang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Taienkang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. in June 2006. Guangdong Taienkang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Shantou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Ting  Li
2.Title: Director, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
